oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Heterogeneous catalytic transfer hydrogenation of aromatic nitro and carbonyl compounds over cobalt(II) substituted hexagonal mesoporous aluminophosphate molecular sieves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MOHAPATRA, SK
SONAVANE, SU
JAYARAM, RV
SELVAM, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: chemoselective transfer hydrogenation
propan-2-ol
aldehydes
ketones
catalytic transfer hydrogenation
aromatic nitro and carbonyl compounds
cobalt(ii)
mesoporous molecular sieves
aluminophosphates.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Catalytic transfer hydrogenation of aromatic nitro and carbonyl compounds was carried out using novel cobalt(H) substituted hexagonal mesoporous aluminophosphate molecular sieves. The catalyst showed excellent yield with good recycling capability. (C) 2002 . .
